metadata.title: Friday, 21st February, 2025
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Finance and National Planning what measures the Government is taking to reduce the cost of borrowing from commercial banks.
Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has finalised the formulation of the Ten (10) Year Road Sector Master Plan; and
(b) if so, whether the following roads in Kamfinsa Parliamentary Constituency are part of the Plan:
(i) Kamfinsa Correctional Facility - Ndola /Mufulira road Junction; (ii) Ndeke Village – Ndeke Presidential; (iii) Zamtan Cemetery; (iv) Mukuba Natwange - Old Natwange;
(v) Katokamema - Kakolo Farm Block; and (vi) township roads in Old and New Ndeke. ___________________________
